column1: Table 6.8: Tentative estimate for Kuda Wewa in Kumbalgamuwa GND

column2: Desilting of tank beds including removing of water weeds and appropriate disposal of material 0.5km DS from the tank (D4 + Loader + Dumper truck) -0.30m thickness over 100% of the water spread area

Earth excavation from borrow area by Excavator and forming tank bund including transporting, placing (150-225)mm  layers, watering, compacting and trimming  as per instructions (haulage up to 01 km) -Filling potholes, depressions & eroded sections
Turfing to new earth including cutting, laying, pegging and watering
Cutting and loading Earth/Gravel by  machinery. (Excavator 120)
Compaction by Roller (8-10)ton up to 2000m3 using vibrator machine.
Construction of new HW type Sluice
Construction of new CO type Spill

Vegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and dense planting at 500mm grid interval, applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer, mulching with straw/ banana tree skin and maintenance
